document.discussion_title: To-Arrive Truck & Rail Bids - Grain Delivered to Chicago
document.topic_text: GX_GR110 Springfield, IL Thu, Aug 11, 2016 USDA-IL Dept of Ag Market News Chicago Terminal Grain Report To Arrive Truck and Rail Bids for Grain Delivered to Chicago. The following quotations represent Bids ($/ bu) from Terminal Elevators, Processors, Mills, and Merchandisers after 1:30 p.m. today. Grain Bids Delivery Change Basis Change SRW Wheat 4.0125-4.1625 30 Days DN 5.5 -15U to OptU UNCH Soybeans 9.9400-10.0900 Spot UP 1.75 10X to 25X UNCH Soybeans 9.9400-10.0900 15-30 Days UP 1.75 10X to 25X UNCH Terminal Elevator Bids Corn 3.0400-3.0600 Spot DN 1.5 -17U to -15U UNCH Corn 3.0400-3.0600 15-30 Days DN 1.5 -17U to -15U UNCH Processor Bids Corn 3.3600-3.3700 Spot UP 0.5-DN 1.5 15U to 16U UP 2-UNCH Corn 3.3300-3.3400 15-30 Days DN 1.5 12U to 13U UNCH Changes are cents per bushel. Spot = up to 15 days Soybeans = US 1 Yellow; Corn = US 2 Yellow Chicago Board of Trade month symbols: F January, G February, H March, J April, K May, M June, N July, Q August, U September, V October, X November, Z December
